items.sentence: Tom is the only one in our family who doesn\'t have a driver\'s license.
The police say that Tom\'s fingerprints were found on the murder weapon.
Tom decided to use Mary\'s computer even though she had told him not to.
Tom probably just wants to find out what time he\'s supposed to be here.
Tom doesn\'t understand what\'s going on either, but he won\'t admit it.
